Public Class SubscriptionValidationResponse Implements IJsonModel(Of SubscriptionValidationResponse), IPersistableModel(Of SubscriptionValidationResponse)

Docs.summary: To complete an event subscription validation handshake, a subscriber can use either the validationCode or the validationUrl received in a SubscriptionValidationEvent. When the validationCode is used, the SubscriptionValidationResponse can be used to build the response.
